frontmatter.title: Three-Dimensional Stories
frontmatter.description: One of the great archival videos on YouTube isÂ Kurt Vonnegut's short presentation on the shapes of stories. By plotting the emotional arc of a story as a function of time, Vonnegut shows a couple generic paths that encompass a lot of stories -- such as 'man in hole' (a fall when something bad happens, then a rise when it gets resolved) or 'Cinderella' (a rise from the bottom, a fall when the clock strikes midnight, then a rise to happily ever after).
